documentation.author: Ed Holden
documentation.purpose: This rule is designed to place the telemtry subphase orders if a ED physician places and admit to inpatinet /place in observation order with Telemtry bed type through Firstnet.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PT_ACTION_DETAIL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient is ACTION and the SPECIFIC ACTION_DETAIL QUALIFIER DETAIL_VALUE

statements.statement:
select Action = if (d.seq = 1) "*ANY ACTION" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Admitted" elseif (d.seq = 3) "Encounter Combined" elseif (d.seq = 4) "Person Combined" elseif (d.seq = 5) "Person Encounter Combined" elseif (d.seq = 6) "Discharged" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Transfered" endif,
_hidden = (d.seq - 1),
Description= if (d.seq = 1) "Any patient event" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Current admit date defined, previous admit date is not defined" elseif (d.seq = 3) "Current and previous encounter id's differ" elseif (d.seq = 4) "Current and previous person id's differ" elseif (d.seq = 5) "Current and previous person & encounter id's differ" elseif (d.seq = 6) "Current discharged date is defined but previous discharge date is not" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Current and previous location codes differ" endif
from (dummyt d with seq = 7)
order by action

select Action = if (d.seq = 1) "current" elseif (d.seq = 2) "previous" elseif (d.seq = 3) "current or previous" endif,
_hidden = (d.seq),
Description= if (d.seq = 1) "Current or new admission record values" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Previous admission record values" elseif (d.seq = 3) "Check before and after values" endif
from (dummyt d with seq = 3)
order by d.seq

select Action = if (d.seq = 1) "is" elseif (d.seq = 2) "is not" endif,
_hidden = (d.seq - 1)
from (dummyt d with seq = 2)
order by d.seq

select Action = if (d.seq = 1) "current" elseif (d.seq = 2) "previous" elseif (d.seq = 3) "current or previous" endif,
_hidden = (d.seq),
Description= if (d.seq = 1) "Current or new admission record values" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Previous admission record values" elseif (d.seq = 3) "Check before and after values" endif
from (dummyt d with seq = 3)
order by d.seq

select Action = if (d.seq = 1) "is" elseif (d.seq = 2) "is not" endif,
_hidden = (d.seq - 1)
from (dummyt d with seq = 2)
order by d.seq

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_LOC_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL that QUAL in DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST for any order(s) in LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PLAN_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Active plans POWERPLAN exist OPT_TIME_QUAL OPT_TIME_VALUE OPT_TIME_UNIT from current date/time for person OPT_LINK.
templateDefinitions.description: Active plans POWERPLAN exist OPT_TIME_QUAL OPT_TIME_VALUE OPT_TIME_UNIT from current date/time for person OPT_LINK.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SETUP_ADD_ORDERS_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Setup GROUP_NAME to add ORDERS with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT for OPT_SCOPE as OPT_LINK
templateDefinitions.description: Prepare orderables to be sent to the Order Server

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SET_ORDER_SENTENCE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Set details for orders setup by GROUP_NAME using ORDER_SENTENCE
templateDefinitions.description: Use order sentence to set order detail values

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALL_ORDER_SERVER_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Call order server with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT
templateDefinitions.description: Send orders and actions from prior templates to the Order Server

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SET_ORDER_DETAIL_A
templateDefinitions.definition: SET_ACTION ORDER_DETAIL equal to OPT_VALUE or inherit it from OPT_LINK for orders setup by GROUP_NAME

column.value: Add details' value if it's not already set
Empty detail's value (for NEW order only)

values.value: Order Sentence for Telemetry -> Patient may be off tele for tests
Order Sentence for Telemetry -> Maintain tele when patient off unit

customValue.value: 288217307\TOnce, for signs of respiratory distress\S113038717\MPulse Ox Spot Check\C113038713\O111965744

values.value: Order Sentence for Pulse Ox Spot Check -> Once, for signs of respiratory distress
Order Sentence for Notify Physician Chest Pain -> If recurrent/unresolved
Obtain and order 12 lead EKG STAT as needed for chest pain and/or sudden rythm changes.
